= notes =

== Syntax ==
 field: '''.notes''' (Read/Write)

== Description ==
The '''notes''' field stores and retrieves zone-specific notes or documentation as a string. This field provides a way to attach descriptive text, instructions, or other information to zones, allowing zone builders and administrators to store important details about specific areas or zone configurations.

== Field Access ==
{| class="wikitable"
! Access !! Type !! Description
|-
| Read || string || Returns the current notes text for the zone
|-
| Write || string || Sets the notes text for the zone
|}

== Availability ==
This field is available on the following unit types:
* zoneptr (Zone pointer)

== Examples ==
 dilbegin zone_info_display(zone : zoneptr);
 var
    current_notes : string;
    zone_name : string;
 code
 {
    if (zone.type != UNIT_ST_ROOM)
    {
       exec("say That's not a zone!", self);
       return;
    }
    
    zone_name := zone.name;
    current_notes := zone.notes;
    
    exec("say Zone: " + zone_name, self);
    exec("say Notes: " + current_notes, self);
 } dilend

 dilbegin set_zone_notes();
 var
    target_zone : zoneptr;
    new_notes : string;
 code
 {
    target_zone := findroom("admin_zone@midgaard");
    
    if (target_zone != null)
    {
       // Set comprehensive zone notes
       new_notes := "This zone is for administrative use only." + "\n" +
                   "Access restricted to authorized personnel." + "\n" +
                   "Contact zone administrator for modifications.";
       
       target_zone.notes := new_notes;
       exec("say Zone notes updated.", self);
    }
    else
    {
       exec("say Could not find admin zone.", self);
    }
 } dilend

 dilbegin zone_note_reader();
 var
    current_zone : zoneptr;
    note_text : string;
    note_parts : stringlist;
    i : integer;
 code
 {
    current_zone := findroom("example_zone@midgaard");
    
    if (current_zone != null)
    {
       note_text := current_zone.notes;
       
       // Split notes into lines for processing
       note_parts := split(note_text, "\n");
       
       exec("say Zone Notes:", self);
       i := 0;
       while (i < length(note_parts))
       {
          exec("say Line " + itoa(i) + ": " + note_parts.[i], self);
          i := i + 1;
       }
    }
    else
    {
       exec("say No zone found.", self);
    }
 } dilend

 dilbegin create_zone_with_notes();
 var
    new_zone : zoneptr;
    initial_notes : string;
 code
 {
    // Create a new zone with initial notes
    new_zone := findroom("new_zone@midgaard");
    
    if (new_zone != null)
    {
       initial_notes := "Created: " + mudyear + "/" + mudmonth + "/" + mudday + "\n" +
                       "Purpose: Player starting area" + "\n" +
                       "Status: Under development";
       
       new_zone.notes := initial_notes;
       exec("say New zone created with notes.", self);
    }
 } dilend

== Usage Notes ==
* The '''notes''' field provides read/write access to zone notes
* Used for storing zone documentation, policies, or descriptive text
* Notes can contain multiple lines separated by newline characters
* Common uses include:
** Zone descriptions and instructions
** Administrative information
** Development status tracking
** Zone-specific rules or policies
* Notes are stored as plain text strings
* Use [[split]] function to process multi-line notes

== Error Handling ==
* Returns '''fail''' if zone pointer is null or invalid
* Returns '''error''' if accessed on an unsupported unit type
* Setting very long notes may cause memory issues
* Always validate zone pointer before accessing the notes field
